entry.title: Python for makers
entry.summary:
Summary

Digital fabrication is the art of translating digital designs into physical objects. Using personal machines that are controlled via software, a live demonstration of CNC milling and 3D printing will also be performed. This talk is a walkthrough from 3D models to machine motion, that shows how we can â€¦
entry.content:
Summary

Digital fabrication is the art of translating digital designs into physical objects. Using personal machines that are controlled via software, a live demonstration of CNC milling and 3D printing will also be performed. This talk is a walkthrough from 3D models to machine motion, that shows how we can use Python to write GCODE generators that create endless form.
